Description: This JSON file provides a data dictionary for the corresponding TSV file.

purdue_dh_avg.Description: purdue pegboard test average number of completed trials dominant hand

purdue_ndh_avg.Description: purdue pegboard test average number of completed trials nondominant hand

purdue_both_avg.Description: purdue pegboard test average number of completed trials both hands

purdue_dh_ndh_both_avg.Description: purdue pegboard test average number of completed trials across hands and both hands

purdue_assembly_avg.Description: purdue pegboard test average number of completed trials assembly

reading_text_acc.Description: text reading total accuracy across 2 texts

reading_text_rt.Description: text reading total rt across 2 texts

cvlt_tot_imm.Description: california verbal learning task, total immediate recall 5 trials list A

cvlt_tot_recall.Description: california verbal learning task, total across immediate and short term recall 5 trials list A + 1 trial list A after distractor

spoon_rt_manual.Description: spoonerisms rt measured by hand via chronometer, total task

regular_acc.Description: word reading test, accuracy for regular words

irregular_acc.Description: word reading test, accuracy for irregular words

pseudo_acc.Description: word reading test, accuracy for pseudo words

regular_rt.Description: word reading test, rt for regular words

irregular_rt.Description: word reading test, rt for irregular words

pseudo_rt.Description: word reading test, rt for pseudo words

non_word_rep_span.Description: non-word repetition, span is maximum sequence length reached across whole task, e.g., 5 is maximum length was a sequence of 5 words

non_word_rep_acc.Description: non-word repetition, number of correctly repeated non-words across whole task, e.g., 34 is 34 non-words were repeated without errors in pronunciation

phon_suppr_acc.Description: phoneme suppression test, accuracy across task

phon_suppr_rt_manual.Description: phoneme suppression test, rt across task measured manually via chronometer

wordreading.Description: word reading test, cumulative average accuracy score across word types

apm_corr.Description: ravens advanced progressive matrices correct responses

apm_incorr.Description: ravens advanced progressive matrices incorrect responses

rtt_sub_corr.Description: revised tempo test subtractions correct responses

rtt_sub_incorr.Description: revised tempo test subtractions incorrect responses

finger_tapping_dominant.Description: finger tapping test, number of taps across trials, dominant hand

finger_tapping_nondominant.Description: finger tapping test, number of taps across trials, nondominant hand

digit_for_span.Description: digit span forward, maximum verbally delivered digits repeated in the same order by typing

digit_back_span.Description: digit span backward, maximum verbally delivered digits repeated backwards by typing

rtt_sum_corr.Description: revised tempo test additions correct responses

rtt_sum_incorr.Description: revised tempo test additions incorrect responses

corsi_back_span.Description: corsi blocks backward, span of maximum visually delivered digits reproduced in the backward order by clicking

cvlt_long_corr.Description: cvlt long term recognition phase correct responses

cvlt_long_incorr.Description: cvlt long term recognition phase incorrect responses

cvlt_long_rt.Description: cvlt long term recognition phase rt

corsi_for_span.Description: corsi blocks forward, span of maximum visually delivered digits reproduced in the same order by clicking

brocanto.Description: brocanto total score across blocks 1-2-3 - accuracy

arith.Description: tempo test total score across additions and subtractions - accuracy

fingertap.Description: finger tapping test total score - taps across task

span_visual.Description: corsi blocks combined score across forward-backward

span_verbal.Description: digit span combined score across forward-backward
